name: SR Labs
overview:
Street Response Laboratories (SR Labs) provides complete electronic trading solutions for the Financial Industry, enabling them to meet the challenges of rapid change, business efficiency and performance.

The focus of SR Labs is to combine expert business knowledge with top-notch technical skills resulting in innovative and robust electronic trading applications.

Please visit us as www.srtechlabs.com Specialties High Performance Ultra Low Latency Solutions, High Speed Order/ Execution/Quoting Gateway, Cutting Edge Market Data Solutions, Extensive Global Exchange Coverage, Reliable Tested & Proven Financial Technologies
